prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon inspired by ocean coral with soft pastel colors.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a coral reef, featuring vibrant hues and unique textures.
Generate a cute aquatic Pokemon with a pink body and a playful demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the sea, with a focus on coral-like features.
Imagine a small, charming creature that thrives in underwater habitats, adorned in pink tones.
Design a Pokemon that captures the beauty of marine life, showcasing a coral aesthetic.
Give me a Pokemon that has a whimsical coral appearance, perfect for a seaside environment.
